cobbleride.configuration.title: Cobblemon: Ride On! Configuration
cobbleride.configuration.general.tooltip: General settings for the movement speed of Ride Pokemon and how some features work.
cobbleride.configuration.general.globalB: Base speed multiplier for all mounted Pokemon.
cobbleride.configuration.general.globalL: Land speed multiplier for all mounted Pokemon.
cobbleride.configuration.general.globalW: Water speed multiplier for all mounted Pokemon.
cobbleride.configuration.general.globalA: Air speed multiplier for all mounted Pokemon.
cobbleride.configuration.general.waterVe: Speed at which qualified Ride Pokemon will ascend and descend while diving.
cobbleride.configuration.general.airVert: Speed at which qualified Ride Pokemon will ascend and descend while flying.
cobbleride.configuration.general.rideSpe: Max speed attribute allowed for Ride Pokemon. This option may be useful for server owners, who may wish to restrict how quickly players can move around the server to minimize chunk loading and server load. A value of 2.1 restricts Ride speed to ~20 blocks/sec. This option is disabled if set to 0.
cobbleride.configuration.general.isWater: Should Ride Pokemon share their water breathing with the rider?
cobbleride.configuration.general.canDism: Can Riders dismount in midair? Setting this to false will not prevent manual dismount via recall, but actions have consequences, and riders are advised to ride responsibly and safely.
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.toolt: Settings for how the Speed stat of a Ride Pokemon influences its movement speed.
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.doesS: Should a Pokemon's Speed stat influence its ride speed?
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.minSp: At and below this Speed stat value, Pokemon will move at the slowest speed.
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.maxSp: At and above this Speed stat value, Pokemon will move at the fastest speed. NOTE: If this value is set below the minimum, the value will be handled as if equal to the minimum.
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.minSp: The speed multiplier for Ride Pokemon at the minimum Speed stat threshold.
cobbleride.configuration.speedStat.maxSp: The speed multiplier for Ride Pokemon at the maximum Speed stat threshold. NOTE: If this value is set below the minimum, the value will be handled as if equal to the minimum.
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.toolt: Settings for how sprinting works for Ride Pokemon.
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.canRi: Is sprinting enabled for Ride Pokemon?
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.rideS: Speed multiplier for Ride Pokemon while sprinting.
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.canSp: Should Ride Pokemon be allowed to sprint in water?
Should Ride Pokemon be allowed to sprint while flying?
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.canRi: Should Ride Pokemon become exhausted if they sprint for too long?
cobbleride.configuration.sprinting.rideS: Number of ticks does takes to fully deplete a Ride Pokemon's stamina.
Number of ticks it takes for a Ride Pokemon to fully recover its stamina from zero.
Number of ticks that must pass before stamina begins to recover.
Speed multiplier for exhausted Ride Pokemon.
